classScheduleInformation: Non-dance majors admitted by audition on a space-available basis.
courseSectionInformation: May be repeated to a maximum of 18 hours. Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance or consent of instructor; departmental placement.
description: Progressive development of the concepts in DANC 260 and DANC 261, with emphasis on virtuosity and versatility. May be repeated to a maximum of 18 hours. Prerequisite: Major standing in Dance or consent of instructor; departmental placement.
label: Int/Adv Contemp Mod Tech Core
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Dance or Dance major(s).
